Name: The Last Place
About the game: The end of the world is coming! Living in the circle of monsters! Content and gameplay: You're going to fight the monster with a gun. The gun was hidden deep. Please search carefully. There are a lot of monsters. Please kill them as soon as possible. Main play Player operator characters fight monsters Use accurate guns to shoot monsters -Explore the vast map Features of the game: First person real exciting way of playing. Players need to collect guns from the island to fight monsters. Control activity: Basic movements W forward S backward A-left D-right Left mouse button - shooting Right mouse button - aim F-pick up guns
